data.body: Create API routes: src/app/api/registry/route.ts (GET/POST/DELETE for registry CRUD) and src/app/api/registry/browse/route.ts (GET with ?path= for directory listing). Add registry schemas to src/lib/schemas.ts. Add RegisteredRepo and DirEntry types to src/lib/types.ts.
data.description: Create API routes: src/app/api/registry/route.ts (GET/POST/DELETE for registry CRUD) and src/app/api/registry/browse/route.ts (GET with ?path= for directory listing). Add registry schemas to src/lib/schemas.ts. Add RegisteredRepo and DirEntry types to src/lib/types.ts.
data.title: Registry and browse API routes
